#summary Explanation for the language files for PRTG
#labels Featured

= Translations for PRTG Network Monitor =

PRTG already comes with a set of translations created by Paessler (e.g. English, German, Spanish and French). Additionally users can translate the software into other languages using the [Translate TranslationTool]. Please note that these translations were not created by Paessler and they are not officially supported by Paessler.

Currently available:

 * http://gf-ptf.googlecode.com/files/nl.png [http://code.google.com/p/prtg7addons/downloads/list?can=2&q=translation:%20dutch Dutch] (by Gerard Feijth)
 * [http://code.google.com/p/prtg7addons/downloads/list?can=2&q=Translation:+Brazilian Brazilian]

= Installation of Language Files=

Please download the language file that fits your PRTG version from the
[http://code.google.com/p/prtg7addons/downloads/list?can=2&q=translation downloads page]

Unzip the file and place it into the /language subfolder of your PRTG installation. Start the PRTG Server Administrator tool and select the desired language from the drop down.
